member.name: M:DG.DeExtensions.ColorExtensions.ChangeBrightness(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single,System.Nullable{System.Single})
member.summary: Returns a new color equal to the given one with changed brightness

Brightness factor (multiplied by current brightness)

member.name: M:DG.DeExtensions.StringExtensions.Nicify(System.String)

member.name: M:DG.DeExtensions.StringExtensions.ToEnum``1(System.String,System.Nullable{``0})
member.summary:
Converts the string to the given enum value. Throws an exception if the string can't be converted. If the enum value can't be found, returns the 0 indexed value.
NOTE: doesn't use try/catch (TryParse) since on some platforms that won't work.

member.name: M:DG.DeExtensions.StringExtensions.ToFloat(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Converts the given string to a float and returns it. Returns defaultValue if the conversion fails or the string is empty
member.param: Default value to return if conversion fails

member.name: M:DG.DeExtensions.StringExtensions.VersionIsMinorThan(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares a version string (in format #.#.###) with another of the same format, and return TRUE if this one is minor. Boths trings must have the same number of dot separators.
